summary:
Roel is a Dutch and European Patent Attorney at DeltaPatents (Eindhoven, the Netherlands). 

Roel's activities include patent creation and prosecution (preparing and filing patent applications, examination proceedings, opposition), general IPR consultancy (exploitation/value extraction, infringement), and account/portfolio management for a variety of customers. His specialist areas include optical storage systems, display systems, video and image processing, digital signal processing, software implemented algorithms and computer implemented inventions, hardware and software systems architectures, optics and optical systems, and LED lighting systems.

Roel is also a tutor in courses on the European Patent Convention (EPC) and the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), in particular on substantive and procedural law in the DeltaPatents’ training programs for the D-paper and the pre-exam of the EQE (European Qualifying Examination). Roel is (co-)author of the DeltaPatents' Q&A books "Basic Legal Questions for Pre-Exam and Paper D", "Pre-Exam book", "Main Exam Questions for Paper D" and model solutions of Paper D exam papers.

profile_positions.description:
Dutch and European Patent Attorney

Tutor in the DeltaPatents’ courses that prepare candidates for the EQE (see below for more details).
profile_positions.title: Dutch and European Patent Attorney

profile_positions.description:
Tutor in courses on the European Patent Convention (EPC) and the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT).

Tutoring extends from basic patent law (substantive and procedural law; EPC and PCT) to methodology courses that prepare candidates for the EQE Pre-Examination and paper D. The courses are held in the Netherlands (Utrecht, The Hague/Rijswijk, Eindhoven, Amsterdam) as well as throughout Europe.

(Co-)author of the DeltaPatents' Q&A books "Basic Legal Questions for Pre-Exam and Paper D", "Pre-Exam book", "Main Exam Questions for Paper D" and model solutions of Paper D exam papers.
Since 2022, co-author of "Topic-Related Index to the EPC and PCT" (with Cees Mulder).
Please refer to the DeltaPatents webshop https://webshop.deltapatents.com/en.
profile_positions.title: Tutor Patent Law and EQE Training

profile_positions.company: NLO | European patent and trademark attorneys
